affirmations.text: I'm proud of you. This is hard work and you're doing it anyway.
Every workout is progress, no matter how small it feels today.
I am the type of person who shows up for his future self.
My body is capable of more than I give it credit for.
I choose movement because I deserve to feel strong.
Rest days are part of the journey, not a break from it.
I am the type of person who keeps promises to my future self.
This discomfort is temporary, but the strength I'm building is lasting.
I'm not starting over, I'm continuing forward.
I am the type of person who views food as fuel.
I'm building a life I don't need to escape from.
I am the type of person who trusts in the power of compounding. Small improvements each day lead to unimaginable wealth.
Progress isn't linear, and that's perfectly okay.
I'm learning to love the process, not just the outcome.
I am the type of person who chooses long-term health over short-term comfort.
Every healthy choice I make is an investment in his future self.
I am the type of person who doesn't take a break on hard days.
My consistency matters more than my intensity.
I'm grateful for what my body can do right now, today.
I avoid those things that are inconsistent with my stated goals.
